inclusion.criterion: Newly diagnosed glioblastoma and anaplastic astrocytoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Karnofsky Performance Scale Index equal or more than 60 percent
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: The patients will initially undergo surgery.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is undergoing treatment, which may trigger exclusion criteria. However, the overall assessment is likely ineligible due to the presence of cardiac failure.
